intro.description: In this cheat sheet, we will create the minimal framework in order to start modeling

item.title: Create New Package
item.description: Right-click on the canvas, select New > Package. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'System'

item.title: Open 'System' package diagram
item.description: Double-click on the 'System' package to open the package diagram

item.title: Create component
item.description: From the Palette, expand the 'Components' section, select Component then click on canvas. Set the name in the pop up dialog to 'Device'

item.title: Open the Component diagram
item.description: Double-click on the 'Device' component to open the component diagram
